original_title: Alfredo Krauss, Ruggero Raimondi and Katia Ricciarelli in Concert
overview: This tour-de-force concert event showcases opera luminaries Alfredo Kraus, Ruggero Raimondi and Katia Ricciarelli performing arias and other songs, including "Chanson Boheme" from "Carmen" and "Soli noi siamo" from "Lucrezia Borgia." Filmed live in Madrid and also featuring vocalists Paolo Coni and Lucia Valentini-Terrani, this program also includes "La calunnia e un venticello" from "Il barbiere di Seviglia" and many more.
title: Alfredo Krauss, Ruggero Raimondi and Katia Ricciarelli in Concert
